document_data.mainbody:
Gelugons Gouge was an enchanted spear fashioned out of a tail of an ice devil.
This polearms head was a tail spike of an unlucky gelugon. The weapon was always cold to the touch. It was imbued with a +1 enchantment and burned its targets with the ice devils freezing magic. Upon a successful strike, the spear had a chance of slowing its target down.
One of Gelugons Gouge magic weapons was hidden deep inside a vault of the Temple of Bhaal in the town of Liams Hold, later known as the Stronghold. The enchanted spear was deposited there sometime before the temples fall and abandonment during the Time of Troubles. As of 1372 DR, the spear was still locked behind the vaults hidden door and guarded by three gargoyles.
